divs: Sighting DetailsDriving south on 101 I saw an object over Rohnert Park which appeared round, with red & blue pulsing lights, and lots of little white lights. I saw it from a mile north, down until I couldnt turn my head safely while driving. No place to pull over safely. I thought it was a UFO at first sight because it was unusual, and stationary. I noticed it as a fixed point, which I drove closer to. Upon passing, when I could look to my left to see it directly, it was about the size of a car, hovering in one place, and putting on a light show you'd expect at a rave, not on a flying vehicle. I felt to communicate with it telepathically. My thought was "I can't believe what I'm seeing" and I felt that an impulse came from the object to change my thought around it to "I know what I'm seeing". I was elated and wishing I could stop and look at it without having to drive. I was on a section of freeway where I couldn't pull over safely, so I couldn't stop and film it. I sent the feeling and message of love and peace, thumbs up. My gut feeling is whatever the intelligent source of this vehicle was, is very benevolent.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Rohnert Park
There were no other sightings in Rohnert Park on or around February 8th 2013
Summary: I saw an object over Rohnert Park which appeared round, with red & blue pulsing lights,lots of little white lights. I saw it from a mile north, down until I couldnt turn my head safely while driving. No place to pull over safely.
